fields.description: This modern, elegant and comfortable studio apartment is the perfect solution to discover Paris. Located in the very centre of le Marais, only 2 min walk from metro station Saint-Paul and from rue des Rosiers. Perfect for a couple. This modern 36m2 studio apartment, freshly renovated, is located on the ground floor of a typical district building. fields.description: Marais Terrace This 2300sqft 3BR Paris apartment is very spacious and also features a 400 sqft private terrace. Appointed with outdoor furniture and barbecue grill, the terrace is ideal for outdoor eating and entertaining. Master and second bedroom have queen-sized beds, third bedroom has two single beds, a trundle bed, and a crib. From the apartment’s private, street-level entrance, a carpeted staircase leads one flight up to the main floor, where you’ll enter into the large open floor plan of the living and dining rooms. Also on this level are the master bedroom, full bathroom, additional WC, kitchen, and utility room with washer/dryer. Two additional bedrooms and a full bathroom are located on the level above. The living area features a white leather couch and chairs that are arranged around a rustic coffee table and face three sets of French doors that open onto the terrace. fields.transit: The Seine River is around the corner, the Notre-Dame Cathedral and the romantic Ile Saint Louis are a short 5 minutes walk. If you have any interest in art, you have plenty of galleries and workshops where you can buy exquisite gifts. You are also a short stroll away to Place des Vosges and of all those beautiful museums: Carnavalet, Jewish Museum, Picasso Museum and so many others. The Louvre, even closer, is a 5 minutes walk. On top of everything, and it is rather rare in the center of Paris, this is a very quiet apartment in the middle of a superb lively neighborhood.

Stay in one of our handpicked apartments, all located in the best neighborhoods!

fields.description: Lovely apartment with antique wood floor located in the heart of old Paris next to metro StPaul (line 1), next to Carnavalet, Picasso museum, Maison européenne de la photographie, place des Vosges, Hotel de Ville, place de la Bastille. The neighbourhood is calm, but restaurants and bars are just 5mn walking from home. 3rd floor with elevator. The flat is composed of 2 bedrooms and the living-room. The living-room and the largest bedroom overlook the street. The other bedroom has view on the courtyard, as well as the kitchen. The kitchen is fully furnished : washing machine, gas+electric oven, microwave oven, fridge. Bathroom, separated toilet. Electric heating in each room. WIFI, TV, landline phone, and a choice of various guide books to find all necessary informations and tips about the city!
fields.house_rules: We have two cats (females). We ask our guests to feed them everyday. Pet food is provided. Our cats are very quiet, one is tortoise shell and the other is black. They don't scratch or bite. They are very independant. They will never bother you, provided that you feed them everyday!
fields.summary: You will find a cosy apartment with antique wood floor, confortable sofa, a large bedroom with a desk. and a dressing room. The rooms give on a quiet street, especially at night. The great advantage is the location, in the heart of lively area, with all kind of shops, boutiques, and various museums. With metro line 1 at only 5mn walk, you will reach in less than 30mn most of all famous places of Paris.

The apartment is ideally located in the heart of Paris, surrounded by Châtelet Les Halles (the most connected Metro station in Paris) and key landmarks including the Pompidou Center, Le Marais, Le Louvre, Notre-Dame Cathedral and the Île Saint-Louis. The Rue Des Lombards is known for its many bars and restaurants as well as for having the most famous jazz clubs in Paris. During the day, the street is home to locals and tourists, stoping for a coffee or taking a stroll between its many shops. The apartment is on the 3rd floor of an historical building typical of Paris' central area. When in the apartment we would ask you to avoid loud music, slamming doors, shouting and walking around the apartment wearing high heels. Slippers are provided. - Please do not hold parties or noisy meetings. - The bins are mostly located in the courtyard, or ground floor or basement. We kindly ask you not throw the glass in the glass bin after 8:30 pm and before 7 am, to avoid noise for the neighbours. fields.name: Ile Saint Louis lover nest
fields.neighborhood_overview: The Ile Saint-Louis is the must see historic site in Paris. At the very heart of the city, this island attracts by its architecture, beautiful doors and façades, its narrow cobblestoned streets and its many little shops. Stroll along the tree-lined quays and sit down for a moment to watch the barges go…The show is even more fascinating at night with the lights of the boats reflecting and dancing on the facades. The quintessential romantic! Cafes on the island have superb views of Notre-Dame and Ile de la Cité. All shopping necessities are present on Ile Saint Louis: a pharmacy, a post office, a newsagent, bakeries and pastry cooks, wine and cheese shops, grocery stores and other fine shops.

fields.host_about: Guest Apartment Services Paris is Luxury Boutique Apartment Rentals owned by Christophe & Philippe. Since 1997, we are offering luxury vacation rentals with personalized services, specializing on Ile St Louis and Notre Dame area. We offer a large selection of exclusive properties. Each apartment has been individually decorated in a "Parisian" style, warm and welcoming. Most of them offer panoramic views of the Seine and the monuments of Paris, mansions in an 17th century historical building. A Welcoming office is at your service on Ile Saint Louis, within easy walking distance from each apartment. Professional team including personalized Concierge Services & Maid service. Since almost 20 years, our passion is to make our guest’s stay perfect and memorable. >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Guest Apartment Services Paris est une agence professionnelle de location d'appartements meublés de haut standing, offrant des services personnalisés de qualité à sa clientèle. Aujourd'hui, notre société propose des appartements sélectionnés rigoureusement. Ils sont idéalement situés au cœur du Paris historique, sur l’Ile Saint Louis ou dans les quartiers proches de Notre Dame. Notre bureau vous accueille sur l'Ile Saint Louis, proche de chaque appartement afin de répondre à toutes demandes. Nos services de conciergerie personnalisés ainsi que nos services de ménage et de maintenance accompagnent nos clients tout au long de leur séjour. Depuis 1997, nous sommes pour vous et avec vous à Paris.

fields.description: The apartment has been fully renovated with a modern and neutral decor in one of the finest area of Paris. Ideally located in the heart of Ile Saint Louis, a few steps from Notre Dame, this apartment is furnished to a high standard and offers great comfort for 6 persons, with centralised air conditioner. Situated on the top 4th floor (no elevator, but the stairs are easy to climb) of a beautiful renovated 17th century building, this apartment is full of character with its original wooden beams and terracotta floor tiles. The two master bedrooms have a queen size 160x200 bed and high quality beddings. The adjoining bathroom is complete with an elegant bathtub, hair dryer and toilet. The large living room has a convertible sofa bed with a premium 140x190 mattress and two armchairs, stone fireplace, 42 inch led TV, Bose sound system with Wifi/Airplay, a large dining table with 6 comfortable chairs. fields.name: Bright 2 bed flat Ile Saint Louis
fields.neighborhood_overview: Ile Saint Louis has a village atmosphere in the heart of Paris, next to Notre Dame cathedral, the Marais and the latin quarter/St Michel. The island has lots of independent boutiques and quality food stores, bars and restaurants. The apartment is nestled in the middle of the main old street of Ile Saint Louis, one of the most prestigious and sought after area of Paris. It is a peaceful oasis of calm from the rush of the city, a quaint romantically frozen 17th century village with its own bakers, cheese and wine shops, fine grocers, gastronomic restaurants, cafés, boutiques, art galeries and of course its unique Berthillon ice cream! Ile Saint Louis is just a few steps away from many Parisian landmarks - Notre Dame cathedral, Le Marais, Place des Vosges, Latin quarter/Saint Michel, Hotel de Ville, the Louvre and Beaubourg museums. This island, rich of history and palaces, has long been home to writers, musicians, artists and celebrities.

fields.description: Situé en plein coeur du Marais, au centre de Paris dans un immeuble du 18e Appartement typique du quartier , avec beaucoup de charme, ( 45m2 ) composé d'un grand salon (30m2) avec cuisine ouverte , salle de bain avec baignoire, et une chambre avec un grand lit double. L'appart donne sur cour donc très calme Proche tous commerces, bars sympas, quartier très animé, shopping .. 2 min à pied du métro Hotel de Ville. Possibilité d'un 3e voyageur sur un canapé non convertible mais très confortable! Je ne suis pas du tout invasive, mais reste entièrement à votre dispo si besoins ! Le Marais est un quartier exceptionnel ! : multitudes de bars, de restos et de boutiques sympas, où simplement pour s'y balader ! En plein coeur de Paris, vous pouvez allez où vous voulez dans la ville en un temps record ! Parking public situé à 200m, métro le plus proche Hotel de Ville, et Chatelet à 3 min à pied, qui est un arrêt de multiples correspondances !

fields.description: A beautiful renovated apartment in the heart of Paris, a minute walk from the Pompidou Center, Hôtel de Ville, Châtelet. The apartment (50m2) can sleep up to 4, it has 2 large rooms and a living room, fully equipped kitchen and a fantastic view! Take a map of Paris and point at the very center of it, that's it - you found our place. Really, the apartment is so central, you may not even use the metro during your stay. You can visit exhibits in the Pompidou center, have falafel in the Marais, take a walk along the Seine, visit Notre Dame, have great meal in Quartier de Montorgueil, watch a show, a concert or a movie in one of the many theatres nearby, enjoy a true Parisian market, or simply get lost, "flâner" as they call it here, in the heart of Paris - All this and so much more just as you step outside the building. It's extremely easy to reach the apartment once you get to Paris: -From Charles De Gaulle airport- take RER B directly to Châtelet (30 min) -From Orly airport - take the Orly bus to Denfert, then RER B to Châtelet (30 min) -From Gare du Nord - take the RER B to Châtelet (5 min) -From Gare de Montparnasse - take line 4 to Châtelet (20 min) -From Gare de Lyon - take line 14 to Châtelet (10 min) -From Gare de l'est - take line 4 to Châtelet (20 min)
fields.features: Host Has Profile Pic,Host Identity Verified,Is Location Exact
fields.space: Take a map of Paris and point at the very center of it, that's it - you found our place. Really, the apartment is so central, you may not even use the metro during your stay. You can visit exhibits in the Pompidou center, have falafel in the Marais, take a walk along the Seine, visit Notre Dame, have great meal in Quartier de Montorgueil, watch a show, a concert or a movie in one of the many theatres nearby, enjoy a true Parisian market, or simply get lost, "flâner" as they call it here, in the heart of Paris - All this and so much more just as you step outside the building. Paris aside, the apartment itself is a real treat. It's pretty big and fully equipped- the bedroom has a nice comfy bed, the large living room has a sofa bed that can comfortably fit 2 people, the dining area has a big dining table, and the kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher, and an oven. We are located on the 7th floor, so you can enjoy your breakfast, or a romantic dinner, having a splendid view of the city
fields.name: Beautiful & central apt (Marais)
fields.neighborhood_overview: Other than the many Parisian highlights in the vicinity, our quartier has many "hidden" and less known spots. We would be happy to share them with you. Also, there are 3 supermarkets on our street, and one of the best "boulangeries" in town. You'll end up feeling pretty Parisian here.

fields.interaction: We love our apartment! We would love for you to stay in it while we are away. Therefore, chances are few we will have a lot of time to spend together... But we are friendly and easily reachable by phone / email. If a problem arises our friend will be on site to help solve it.
fields.host_about: It's hard not to fall in love with this city... I speak from experience :) I came here as an exchange student and decided to stay. I work in the film industry, and Paris is a great place for cinema-lovers. But it's also an awesome place for people who like good food, nice wine, and art - so I'm here to stay! I look forward to have you over and share with you some of my favorite Parisian adresses.

fields.neighborhood_overview: El Raval is a neighbourhood in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, Spain. The area, especially the part closest to the port, was also informally known as Barri Xinès or Barrio Chino, meaning "Chinatown". El Raval is one of the two historical neighborhoods that border La Rambla, the other being the Barri Gòtic, and contains some 50,000 people. An area historically infamous for its nightlife and cabarets, as well as prostitution and crime, El Raval has changed significantly in recent years and due to its central location has become a minor attraction of Barcelona. The northern border of the neighborhood is marked by Plaça Catalunya and Plaça Universitat, and the street which connects them, Carrer de Pelai. It ends in the east with La Rambla, and in the west and south, the neighborhood is delimited by Ronda Sant Antoni, Ronda Sant Pau and Avinguda del Paral·lel. There are a few historical monuments such as the Monastery of Sant Pau del Camp, as well as newer additions such as the Ramb

fields.host_about: Hello, my name is Pablo and I work in a restaurant and coffee-shop, although I've studied art because that's my true passion. I also love music, literature, cinema, and scientific fields such as biology, zoology and botany. I love gardening, and when travelling I visit botanical gardens as well as art museums. I think my house is a reflection of my own interests and tastes, and I hope you will enjoy it and care for it as I do. I’m happy to have the possibility of renting my flat from time to time. For me it’s a great responsibility to receive travellers from all over the world, because I want them to feel comfortable and to offer them a clean, tidy, warm and practical space where they can feel at home. As I’m giving you the keys to my own house, I expect maximum care to be taken by my guests and a most respectful attitude toward the neighbours, avoiding any loud music or noises (especially at night, but also in daylight hours) that could disturb their peace.

As a person would will find that I am honest, genuine, caring and helpful and the least I can promise is that you will feel as if you were home in my casa. And if you are lucky maybe I can even help you and show you around the city or some must-see places in Barcelona so we can hang with the locals.

fields.space: I invite you to my great colourful apartment in the centre of Barcelona. It's right in the centre in a nice street 100 meters away from the Ramblas and Placa Catalunya. Ofcourse you have all the great bars, restaurants and shops close by. From the house in Gotico area, you can easily visit the other areas like the lively Borne, the original Raval, and also the characteristic Gracia. The apartment is high up on the third floor and from the balcony's you have a nice view on the shoppingstreet and the old church at the back. We have three bedrooms with double beds. The smallest room has a single bed in the air (a bunk bed), so you have to climb up a bit. If needed we can put an extra bed for a 6th person. There is one bathroom and a kitchen attached to the living room with a big round table. For having Spanish lunches and dinners together it's perfect. Buy some fish from the famous 'Boqueria' market around the corner and start cooking! Hasta pronto!
fields.name: Colourful apartment in city centre (Gotic Area)
fields.neighborhood_overview: It's a great neighbourhood with all the hotspots nearby. Besides the amazing atmosphere of the old Gotic area you can visit a big variety on bars and restaurants. Also you can easily reach other neighbourhoods like Born, Raval or Gracia.
fields.notes: My apartment is not suited or families with children or older people. The apartment is very central in an old building in the authentic gotic quarter. It is not in the nightlife area but you will hear the lively (pedestrian) street and the old Santa Anna church bells. The apartment doens't have an elevator.

fields.host_about: Hola! como estas? I'm Brian, a freelance filmmaker, arts teacher and tourguide from Amsterdam and I live in Barcelona since one year. I love the city, the food, the culture and I love meeting nice people from all over the world. If you like I can also offer you different tours around the city, for example on bicycles (ofcourse on bicycles... because I'm Dutch;)) Also I know special places for going out to watch flamenco or to eat tapas. Barcelona is great at day and at night! Hasta pronto!

fields.description: Nice apartment located in Barri Gòtic, 10 min walking distance from Plaça de Catalunya and 10 min to the beach. The apartment was build following the classical catalan architecture and it was fully renewed in November 2013. All the equipment and furniture are totally new. It is located in Barri Gòtic, Barcelona's historical district. The apartment has 3 rooms in total: 1 bedroom with king bed, one dresser and a third room with a double sofa-bed. The main bedroom has double glazed windows, and you cannot hear any noise from the street. The toilet is separated from the bathroom, and the kitchen is fully equipped (oven, microwave, juicer, fridge, toaster...) There is a large living room were you are free to use TV, home cinema, bluray, etc. There is WIFI connection in all the apartment. Last but not least, you can enjoy the fantastic live in the neighbourhood from the cute balcony, where you can access from the living room and from the bedroom. We rent all the apartment so you are free

Welcome to 'Pondok Sonang'! We bought this beautiful bungalow in 1989, renovated in 2015 and we secured it's character from the 60's. We will personally welcome you and tell you all about the area and (as there is an end to every holiday) we will wish you a safe trip back home.

You will find in this neighborhood lots of students and young people as well as families with children. Oud West is full of nice restaurants, bars, cafes and shops. fields.host_about: Hi, I am Sanne, 39 years old. I work as a family doctor in Amsterdam and my husband as a city councillor for Amsterdam and freelance strategy consultant. We have two children, a 7 year old girl and a 6 year old boy. We have been living in Amsterdam for 20 years and love the city! We enjoy the relaxed vibe and the fact that the city is so compact: One can walk or bike anywhere. We are first time airbnb renters, but have done several home exchanges over the last years, all very successful. We are looking forward to host you in our lovely house!

fields.description: Spacious and bright apartment with welcoming living room, well equipped kitchen with pretty garden view, a superspacious bathroom and two comfortable double bedrooms. 10 min bike ride to city centre (f.e. Dam Square/Anne Frank House). If you need any help during your stay, whether organising your public transport to the airport or finding a great local place to have dinner, I'm happy to help. De Baarsjes is a young and creative neighborhood which has become more and more popular over the past few years. I love it for the great mix of people -every age group and background is represented-, and the local public amenities reflect that variety. You will find cheap local grocery stores and a brand new mosque alongside beautiful design stores and great coffee places. To reach my house from Central Station, you catch tram 13 (direction Geuzenveld) to tramstop Admiraal de Ruyterweg, which takes approximately 12 minutes. From there, it's a 5 minute walk to my house. To reach my house from Schi
fields.house_rules: No pets allowed, no smoking in the house, but feel free to smoke on the balcony. As I live in a quiet street, this is not a place for partying in the house.
fields.summary: Spacious and bright apartment with welcoming living room, well equipped kitchen with pretty garden view, a superspacious bathroom and two comfortable double bedrooms. 10 min bike ride to city centre (f.e. Dam Square/Anne Frank House).
fields.access: As a guest, you have access to the living room, kitchen, bathroom, toilet, laundry room and balcony. Mi casa es su casa.
fields.transit: To reach my house from Central Station, you catch tram 13 (direction Geuzenveld) to tramstop Admiraal de Ruyterweg, which takes approximately 12 minutes. From there, it's a 5 minute walk to my house. To reach my house from Schiphol, you catch a train to Amsterdam Lelylaan (7 mins) and take tram 17 (direction Centraal Station) to tramstop 'Witte de Withstraat' (6 mins). From the tramstop, it's a 5 min walk to my house. If you're travelling by car, there's usually plenty of space to park in front of or nearby the house. There's paid parking (2,40/hour) from Monday til Saturday 09h-24h. You can reach the city center (f.e. Dam Square) by foot in about 30 minutes. If you'd rather explore the city the way the locals do -by bike!- there's several bike rental shops closeby.

fields.description: Very nice family house with garden in one of the most beloved neighborhoods of Amsterdam, The Helmers buurt in Oud West. Trendy restaurants, hipster bars, vintage shops, a daily market, playgrounds for the kids and the the city centre with the famous canals and museums (Van Gogh , Rijksmuseum etc.) at walking distance (10-15 minutes). Our house is situated at the ground and first floor and has a very nice garden at the back . You will have 3 bedrooms and big bathroom at the first floor. Our house is dating from 1900, it consists in total of 5 levels, you will have the ground floor and first floor at your disposal. We complety renovated it and made it a comfortable , modern family house . The entrance is at the ground floor , the kitchen is at the front and has all built inn appliances necessary ; fridge, separate freezer, dishwasher, gas hob, hood and a combi microwave/oven. There is a toilet near the entrance. The garden is at the back you can enjoy the afternoon and evening sun here!

Enjoy a fully equipped apartment and the wonderful restaurants/shops in our neighbourhood. The house is clean, spacious, comfortable and very cosy. Located in a residential area with a lots of great restaurants and shops. The amazing Vondelpark is right at your doorstep. Take our bikes and ride through the park right into the center (bike riding in Amsterdam is the way to go!) or you could just walk 1 min. and take the "tram 1" crossing the entire center of Amsterdam all the way to central station. The Studio has everything you need, a fully equipped kitchen with coffee/tea, oil, herbs etc.. bedding and towels, there is a PC, WiFi, washing machine, iron (+board), hairdryer, hairclipper, soap, shampoo, painkillers, shoeshine you name it. :P We have 2 public transport cards so you can travel cheap like a local. fields.notes: I am born and raised in Amsterdam and know and love this city a lot. To share this, I will provide a guide of Amsterdam with inside information about everyting there is to do and to see in Amsterdam.

fields.interaction: There will only be interacting with guests during check in or check out. But to provide the guests with some insiders info of Amsterdam anyway, I made a real extended guide of Amsterdam with all favorites spots, restaurants, bars, shopping areas, cultural things and more.

fields.description: Nice two floor apartment, on the first and on the second floor, with two sleeping rooms in the South area of the city of Amsterdam. Very fast connections with public transport to the city center and situated in a area with several parcs- and supermarkets on close walking distance. A two floor apartment, on the first and on the second floor, suitable for 4 persons. Living room, kitchen, balcony and terrace on the first floor. On the second floor there are two sleeping rooms with double beds, a toilet, a bathroom with shower and a whirl pool bathtub and two balconies. The apartment is situated on the first and second floor of a family house. First floor open kitchen with all the necessary appliances, micro wave, oven, electric cooking, dishwasher, firdge and freezer, living room and a terrace. The second floor has two sleeping rooms, each with double beds, a bathroom with a shower, a bubble bath bathtub, a toilet, washing machine and wash dryer, tv, lots of storage room, iron and ironing
fields.house_rules: Being quiet in the evening. Smoking outside on the balconies or terrace. Not smoking of hash at all, not in the apartment and on the terrace.

fields.transit: On 10 minutes walking distance there is public tram transport, directly to the city center,line 5). This will take you in 20 minutes to the city centre. Also good bus- and train connections directly to Schiphol airport. Most of our guests arrive by plane at Schiphol airport. From there the cheapest and easiest way to get to our apartment is: Walking out of the arrival hall after picking up the Luggage. From there you walk to the main hall, where you'll find acces to the yellow traintickets machines. There you buy single train tickets to the train station "Amsterdam RAI". The traintickets costs about € 4 each. Then walk to the indicated train platforms 1 and 2. Take the staircase donwstairs to the underground platfoms and wait till the train arrive at platform 1. Most of the intercity trains that arrives will stop at Amsterdam RAI station, a trip that will take about 10 minutes. fields.name: A modern apartment at Buitenveldert
fields.neighborhood_overview: The apartment is situated in the south part of Amsterdam in a busy area and also relatively quiet area with many walking possibilities. On 5 minutes driving distance from the RAI exhibition/conference center and close to the VU Academic hospital.
fields.notes: Supermarket on 5 minutes walking distant from the apartment. Open from 8 AM till 10 PM. Sunday from 10 AM till 8 PM. On short walking distance there is a kosher supermarket and there are kosher restaurants. There is paid parking for the area where the apartment is situated from Monday till Friday from 09.00 AM - 19.00 PM. Free parking during the weekend. Hour rate is: € 1.40. Day rate is: €9,00.

fields.interaction: We, the owners, work and live on the ground floor apartment. We'll do everything to make your stay with us a very nice experience when you come to visit Amsterdam. We live here almost all of our lives and if you want, we can give you a lot of good information about Amsterdam. Of course we respect your privacy.
fields.host_about: I'm 60 years old, married to Stijntje. My hobbies are riding on my VMax 1700, painting and photography. Favorite travel destination is the Cote d'Azur, city of Cannes. I love action movies like those of Tarantino and my favorite music is Soul music from the seventies and eighties, Luther Vandross, Anita Baker, George Benson and more and jazzrock, Peter White, Rippingtons, Kenny G.

fields.description: In a trendy area with a view to a canal, very close to Vondel and Rembrandtpark, in popular Oud-West with many nice café's and restaurants as well as close to the Rijks- and Stedelijk- and Van Gogh museum. Attractive renovated apartment with very comfortable facilities and a big garden. The apartment has a large well equipped dinning kitchen with huge cooking centre and dishwasher. En-suite you'll find the second (bed) room with double doors to the big garden, where smoking is allowed. This room can be converted to a comfortable private bedroom with a high quality inflatable bed. The main bedroom area is on the quiet backside of the apartment, has a comfortable double bed. Furthermore there is a modern toilet and a luxurious bathroom with separate bath and shower. The apartment is at only one minute walk from the huge romantic Rembrandt Park and 5 minute walk of the Central Park of Amsterdam (Vondelpark). This apartment is surrounded by many restaurants, bakeries, butchers, wine shops

fields.host_about: My name is Patrick van Hal (4 March 1975), born and raised in a small town in Holland, has been a professional in sales and communications since 1999. I join AirBnb because I really like to meet new (foreign) people.The past 8 years till now I have worked succesfully in my current position at Roeland Associates, a medium sized PR firm. In everyday operations I am responsible for a team of 8 members. Our main goal is to deliver the best in communications strategy to our clients so they can reach their business and communication goals. The assignments come mainly from the private sector. During the weekends and holidays I love visiting foreign cities and play tennis and squash in a very competitive way. After finishing the School of Economics, I started my career at one of the leading Dutch employment agencies.
